name: Dino Run (ctac5166)
description:
The project was created specifically for Juice Jam!

Character management:

WASD - movement Space (many taps) - Dino acceleration Q - have multiplier  Esc - output

The composition of the game:

  • The choice of difficulty from easy to the most difficult
  • Part 1 of the game is to catch up with a person, you can follow this on the indicators on the right
  • Part 2 of the game - don't die before the finish
Creators Чаисус (Code, Graphics, etc.) Thrimas (Audio designer) Toxic Clam - Special thanks
